place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Food was good, service was great but when I went to the bathroom
Ordered a large order for an office lunch, every item was accounted for and packaged with care, also labeled so it was easy to separate for each person. Thanks team!
Great place for salads, soups, and sandwiches! Kids love it too.

Todo demasiado sabroso.
Es como adictivo la verdad.
To go to place for my wife when she's craving soup. Reasonable priced, great, and quick service.
Love panera. My sunday lunch tradition.
Unos de los mejores restaurantes en su categoria de almuerzos y sanduche bagel el ambiente es fantastico me encanta es como estar en casa con amigos
It's my go to for getting work done and coffee.
Food was good and the place was clean when I visited.

I'm officially done with Panera. This is outrageous. I ordered a bacon, egg and cheese sandwich which cost nearly $7 and they literally gave me a tiny quarter....not half....but a quarter of a sandwich.

This is laughable. Now it was tasty, hence the 2nd star, but I can't give them my money for this anymore.

I really think they were laughing as they made it .

Excellent service. I came a few minutes late to pick up my order and one of the bearded gentlemen who worked there stopped me before I grabbed my food to reheat both sandwiches and the soup!! Amazing 10/10 service, thanks again sir!

I used to love this location. The employees now are not the friendly and familiar faces I became used to. Also, nothing "rapid" about the rapid pick up at this location. They don't put your order on the pickup shelves and there is no designated person to give you your order, despite the sign they hung up that would make you think standing underneath it means you'll receive assistance. Pick up orders stay behind the register and they only have one person up there that's also taking orders and can't be in two place at once. Don't know why they'd try to put all of that on one person and still offer rapid pick up services.
Decent food and coffee. This place i found limited choice of vegetarian options.
Great customer service!!
My husband went to get the veteran's day meal and they stated that they wasn't offering it in a rude manner.
Just like any Panera but we like the quality across the locations. Everyday good food and their lemonade is the best. Here in Charlotte still was able to get a Pick meal for $15 usd
I loved the sandwich I had today! And fast service!
I love this location. Great costumer service and the food is always good.
I was excited when Panera brought back the Baked Potato soup. However it is absolutely disgusting. So disappointed.
My granddaughter chose Panera bread and I don't know why. But she loves the Mac and cheese

Service was horrible. The person that took our order didn't inform us to goto the window to pickup coffee. As we just stood there. My first time back at Panera in over 6 years. Probably will be my last.

Ordered via the kiosk, had to pick up my food, and expected to clean my table, but they still want you to tip. Unable to get cups (to fill my own drink) until the order was ready. So we sat empty handed to wait.

Noticed that the light over our table had no bulb, but a stick on LED that didn't work.

My pick 2 included a hot Mexican corn soup with plenty of potatoes and corn, but zero seasoning. The Greek salad has nice crispy lettuce and a good amount of feta, but only 2 sad little olives. And 3 thin, depressing strips of chicken.

So the food was ok, but certainly not worth $16 (including drink)

I love panera soup they have the best broccoli cheese soup ever my friend likes their mediterranean sandwich and their soup so it's different my my friend likes to  Eat in the back but I would prefer to eat where the windows are so that I can look out but I think a little bit of update
I got the ciabatta cheesesteak n balsamic & grains salad. I really love the half sandwich, half salad or soup idea. It's tasted really good n I want ice full.  It was just enough.

I was disappointed when I purchased a whole salad but it was more like a half salad in a whole salad bowl. Also, there dressing ramekins were placed on the salad inside the bowl. Is it me or does that come off unsanitary? They forgot the hummus that was supposed to come in the salad but we're able to provide a small cup of hummus. My complaint is really the little amount that is placed in a whole salad bowl. I got a salad and a cookie for $20, the least you can do is fill the salad bowl.

Swung by after a long shift, and the employee at the front, a younger employee with curly brown hair, was truly an angel.

I had only ever been to a Panera for lunch/dinner, and typically avoid breakfast because anything with substance typically includes egg, and tends to be pretty pitiful without it.

The employee helped me figure something out & was incredibly kind and patient with my tired, picky eater self, the food was quick and delicious! Even though I tend to like my bacon crispy even the softer bits weren't like... chew for an hour type of chewy.

Will definitely come back (although hopefully for lunch, would hate to be a regular breakfast nuisance with my restrictions)
Great food!!
I love the kiosks setup to order instead of waiting in line.
3rd DoorDash pickup! Friendly staff that are eager to assist Dashers. I love it!

Can't go wrong with Panera!!! I was next door bc I wanted IHOP and after a hour of waiting there and they weren't even packed I left. Came in this location and had my food within 3mins!!! Everyone was pleasant and smiling.

Visiting Panera bread location on South Tryon in Charlotte was a sub-par experience. I got the chipotle chicken sandwich, and the sandwich tasted average. The latte wasn't really anything to write home about.

The place was dirty, suggesting that they don't clean the restaurant often. Parking is available outside.

I won't be back here.
Great atmosphere and friendly staff!

Ordered an everything bagel and this location was unfortunately out. Received a phone call to notify me of the issue. I was not able to answer the call but I do very much appreciate someone calling to let me know of the issue and offer alternative solutions. I substituted the bagel for a pastry. Thank you!

I've been coming here for years and came in and had a fantastic experience thanks to Elizabeth, W, Nyla, and Javier. They really went above and beyond helping me and pumping out customer Service and delicious food at the same time. 10 out of 10 would recommend to everyone. :)
Excellent customer service.  Very clean and well maintained.
Met here weekly for a small Bible study and all staff were so friendly and helpful (especially Mari). Food orders always correct. Happy to come to this Panera!
The issue is not the service or particular store.  They have changed their menu so a few of the favorites my family liked is not on the menu but this store overall is great
The Cinnamon Crunch Bagel is everything! Staff was very helpful. Restaurant was clean & neat.

It was extremely busy so it took longer to get my order, to be expected. Everything was really great tasting, however I did not get the sandwich I ordered for my husband. They either gave me another persons sandwich or the guy keyed in the wrong sandwich. So wasn't happy about that.

Panera bread as name says bread itself tastes so different and yum, liked it. But the stuff within bread either meat or veggies not so great just average. The soup we had is cream of chicken and wild rice it's good.

Great broccoli  and cheese soup
And good salads

It is concerning that at this location the employees are never friendly and welcoming. I have also experienced multiple times that the cashier will handle money with gloves on and use those same gloves to grab bread/food. I personally ask for them to change gloves before handling my food. This should be the standard. Why isn't the guy that is preparing the food not asked to cover his overgrown beard/mustache? Lastly, I questioned if they are making enough cinnamon rolls. It almost never fails that no matter what time of the day it is, they are almost always out. Even at 8:00 in the morning they are always out. My biggest concern are the insanitary practices.
Don't value carrier's time.
There is no more service. Just get someone yelling your name from the back with your order in the window. Even taking orders you are directed to use the self order tablets.
Top Notch service fast and friendly, and the food was delicious
We truly miss Lily.

Customer service sucks.
I came in and had an online order and the guy behind the counter just starred at me. Some else came in after me and he offered to help him before me and I was there first. Will never eat there again.
Great service, clean restaurant
Soup delicious
They were out of a few sides when I got there later in the evening, but the dinner I ordered was delicious and fresh. Fast and friendly service. Convenient location near shopping center.

I hadn't been to Panera Bread in a long while, but I'm glad I went. The service was so efficient and the workers were polite.  The food was extremely tasty and filling. The atmosphere was pleasant and it was clean, including the restrooms. Worth every penny.
Always good fresh taste.
It's been a while since I've been to Panera and it didn't disappoint .

Excellent sandwich and soup at this place. The food is quite good, the price is reasonable. You order through the screen, so interactions with the staff are very minimal - but the one I interacted with is quite pleasant and friendly.

The place is very comfortable to sit on. The place is not too crowded, and the lights of the place is relaxing. Parking is easy at this place.
Teohe exellent restaurant baguettes

Great food and overall positive experience here. I did a mobile order pickup for this. I have eaten here before this as well and the experience has been fine.

At this visit I was a little puzzled why my order wasn't on the shelf. I had to follow around the guy who seemed to be running the operation after I stood at the front under the rapid pick up sign waiting for someone to tell me where my food was. When I finally got to talk to him, he said someone/people had come in was causing chaos at the pick up area so they had to move all pick up items behind the counter. At least for that I was grateful my order was saved.

The food was piping hot and smoothie was cold and delicious! Thank you!
I ordered the turkey w/ avocado & BLT. Also broccoli & cheddar cheese soup. It was so delicious! It made my day!

So much of confusion tonight.. my order was given to someone else. We had to chase the person down to get back the food. All sides were wrong in the order. I had ordered Broc Mac and Cheese as Broc cheddar soup was out of stock. I got the regular Mac and cheese. For some reason the food wasn't tasting good. The chicken wasn't cut at correct proportion. Overall a bad experience tonight
I recommend this location.

My 5 stars are for the way I was treated, the employees are so nice and work fast, but the food wasn't good I bought a melted baguette but nothing was melted lol it was just bread, barely cheese barely sauce  I mean melt for me meaning something being melted inside my baguette but it was just the toasted baguette.. Really sad  I paid 17 dollars not fair

Overly priced. I ordered  the Chicken Green Goddess Caprese Melt - Stacked Toasted but it came without chicken 
I can't believe I paid over $14 for a drink and some bread with little tomatoes and cheese

Becky is the best I am only going to this location just for her! I was having an awful day at work and her spirit just really made me appreciate good people she was so polite and happy about her job I have never had an experience like it and I eat out a lot i just love her!
Paid $8 for a grilled cheese sandwich and my cheese wasn't even melted and it was cold. I picked it up 3 minutes after the estimated time so it's not because it was sitting for a while.

I went a few times to get my order and they keep the order behind the counter now. Which is a inconvenience because I order rapid pick up and they got Halloween decorations in the place where you would normally pick up your food. The employees be in the back talking so I have to wait until someone come to the counter to give me my order. My food tasted horrible today. The spinach wasn't fresh. I threw away my food.
Typical Charlotte lack of customer service is horrible here. As if you're making them work at Panera bread that's the choice you made.

Fat and lazy employees (no shade to fat people) who are incompetent and visibly unhappy.
Not sure if she spit in my drink because her big back blocked my view.

Not the nicest Panera Bread location. My food was good but I personally was not to comfortable with the homeless man sleeping in one of the booths. I really enjoyed the panera itself such as the food and employees but the location is not the best.

This location is extremely professional at Whitehall off of South Tryon Street in Charlotte. They work together as a team and they show their dedication to the community and the individuals that come in there I enjoy this location.
This Panera could use a facelift for sure, but the hardest part is the customers leaving it a mess and making it .
Great food
Mid day snack and tea

Walk in, immediately greeted by cashier Corey and felt right at home! Very friendly and polite service! Food was made promptly and they guys making food made some good conversation as they prepared everything. This is the go to Panera in the area!
This place looks and smells so filthy.If you visit the location on Waverly it doesn't smell remotely anything like this. Management needs to do better. Cleanliness should be a top priority.

Started going back to here recently. Their menu has changed for the better. They are constantly catering, so sometimes they run out of pastries. They have a caffeinated drink mixed with pink lemonade that will start your day off right. But trust me, only drink a smidgen.
Good as always. Love the broccoli  Cheddar  soup

Why would you think everyone wants more cilantro???? I already know that the warm bowls have cilantro rice but to add more so it overpowers the teriyaki chicken??? No. Ask people if they want it instead of ruining lunch for us cilantro haters.

Great coffee!!!
Service excellent and and place always clean!!!

If I could give 0 stars I would. Was in line at 10:55 girl took forever with person before me didn't look like she knew what she was doing. And while waiting it turned 11am and they removed breakfast right away. I was only one in line and I could order breakfast. TERRIBLE SERVICE.
Ideal place for early mornings breakfast  Fresh food.  Delightful sweet course.

Consistently terrible. I have tried this Panera several times in the past few years hoping it would get better. This is the Panera that delivers to my location, so I have not eaten there in person.  Every order I've gotten has been missing food and the rest of the food is sloppily put together. When I try to call, no one answers. Last time I'll be using this location.

They are slow as hell, the cashier acts like they don't know how to ring in orders. All I orders was a drink. The cashier acted like she did not know what a drink was. She filled my cup up halfway. I told her I paid $5 for the drink I need the cup filledfilled up up to the top. It took 20 mins to order and to get my drink. Never again
Delicioso, un buen sitio para comer buena comida A++++
Food was amazing, just alittle pricy for me. But everything was fresh and service was good.
Great, fast service!
I frequent this Panera often.Always clean.Great service,fresh food.
That salad tasted like it had dirt on it. 0/10. The soup was good though and the place was clean.

Place a mobile order for a Cobb chicken salad and this is what I got no chicken or bacon no eggs no cucumber nothing just lettuce and onion so disappointed.  I have been calling for hours no answer. I was on my lunch break so I couldn't go back right away
First time seeing a Panera so filthy! To add insult they got my order wrong. Would not recommend !
Always good food and great customer services.

With my gluten allergy, I have not visited a Panera in years; this year somebody brought one of the Summer Salads (strawberries and tangerines...delicious). Going back on my own ordered the Teriyaki Chicken ($16 with drink) and I am very disappointed. Not sure if they gave me a smaller size (from one of theirs pick 2) or whatever but not worth the price. 1 piece of broccoli, 1/2 cup or rice and 1/2 cup of chicken??!! Not nice. Pic of silverware for comparison...
Toller Service und leckere Sandwich

Avoid this place AT ALL COST. Two days ago, I came here and did the curbside pickup ended up waiting in my car for almost half hour so I went inside and come to find out they haven't even started making my phone, so now it's a total of an HOUR. So I was hungry again today and found a hair in my Chilli & on top of that they don't answer their phone. I've been going here for forever and beside these incidents it's only been one other time I had a problem with PLASTIC in my chicken soup. This place is NOT CLEAN
Comfortable location for meeting friends and colleagues.

Every morning it seems to be getting worse. My order was wrong 3 days. And on day 4 the sandwich was burned.
This was my breakfast sandwich this am....notice the paper still wrapped on the slice of cheese...horrible.
Customer service was quick, and my drink was fantastic. Everyone should try it.
Great food
Delightful sandwiches!!!
Staff was nice enough. Service was sort of slow for low customers, but the food was delicious.
Nikki at Panera whitehall is such a light. She energized my whole day with her smile & attitude
Excelente
Food was okay restaurant just had a funny smell to it

Such a wonderful Panera! Fresh food,  great staff,  decently priced! Love their BBQ Ranch! Broccoli chedder soup is my favorite with a baguette! Love love this restaurant! Good location for shopping and lunch!
Christian was very helpful and very sweet. I will be back
Ordering from the app for dine in was easy. Received a text message when my order was ready at the pickup window. Flatbread pizza was tasty.
Nice staff great food

To be honest the food wasn't too bad but I don't like how the staff here behave. I don't go to this place usually so I took a while to decide what I want to order. Then I had difficulty to say my order because I'm not a native speaker and I'm talking through a mask. However, I didn't expect the staff being that rude to me. He didn't have patience to his customer. He should be trained again about how to behave to customer since that's as important as the quality of the food.

If I can write a zero star I would. This place is terrible. The staff there are extremely rude. I had seen many roll their eyes at me and be extremely rude verbally. I think his name was Christian, he was especially rude. He had cuss at me when I was asking about the menu, I don't get what his deal is but that's not how you talk to a customer. I have also seen many of the staff sneeze around the food which is extremely unsanitary. It's much more unsanitary when u see them sneeze into their hands but don't wash or use sanitizer after. I have also seen hair in my food and I'm pretty sure it's from the staff name Any or something. Overall extremely terrible customer service, would never ever come back again. I wouldn't go back even if someone pay me.

Always a smooth experience at this location. The employees are nice- especially an older gentleman who works in the morning. He is very quick getting orders ready!!  This spot is quick no matter how busy it is. I love the unlimited beverage plan
Me encanta
Deliciosa comida
Normally spectacular, but today my sandwich was lacking meat, and the drink machine always had an issue nowadays. Today,  no ice and no carbonation.  The soup was great!

I just ordered a bacon and avocado turkey sandwich. I get the sandwich home and there's no avocado on it at all.   I'm way on the other side of town by now hungry,  so I called them 3 times the phone hung up on me3 times. Not happy  at all!.
Surprisingly delicious margherita pizza. Obviously plenty of other options to choose from for breakfast, lunch, or a snack. Good place to relax between appointments, get some work done, etc.
Excellent online ordering experience!

my fav panera in charlotte.
i'm there everyday.
Food is always prepared quickly Employees are so kind... i've seen firsthand the bs customers they have to deal with and they're super professional.
Food was not great like usual, my stomach hurts really bad and I want a refund too be honest!! Sandwich could have been way better and my sandwich was made with the wrong bread I asked & paid for.

Haven't been to a Panera for so long and decided to come this place instead when we saw a line at IHOP. We ordered two of the half breakfast sandwiches with bacon with croissant, iced latte & coffee. When I drank the iced latte, it tasted very disgusting like if someone puts sweet sour sauce into the latte-- very nasty. The next thing I noticed is that the bacon was missing on one of the half sandwich I ordered, I needed to ask for a remake. The croissant came out cold and isn't worth paying $3 for. This reminded me of how nasty the coffee at Panera is and am not coming back.
We were very disappointed with our experience. The food is horribly overpriced. The staff was disinterested to say the best.
Wonderful service.
Out of several soups, out of bread bowl, tables and order kiosks dirty, and personnel rude.
Very sketchy clientele. I've seen ankle monitors to people coming up to me and asking me for change to buy food inside. The service itself is good.

Manager very rude,,,I was asking question about an order of soup and he consist  on saying it want be discounted.....I never asked anything  about discount....I never go to any restaurant looking for an handout...I plan on never visiting  this location again.

I went for 4 years to this location bcuz was AMAISIN and now they change for a new administration and is a total desaster. The location is very dirty an all with a bad costumer services . The food  as a tomate soup is served cold and they reduce the size and look as a drop in the bowl. The service table and the tables for eating are dirt with food everywhere. The associate in the register don't help to another associates and stay up looking around to do NOTHING. She have a bad behavior with all the costumers. You need to wait 20 minuts for paid and another 20 minuts or more to be served in a dirty staff. After years to go there  I slide now to another location far away but is Greatttttt.

This location is below Panera standards. Its never really clean, always dingy and dark. The cups are never stacked for to go or only small is available. Condiments and coffee never up to par. The staff is neutral, never rude but just there.

I ordered 2 breakfast sandwiches, an everything bagel and a Cinnamon Toast Crunch bagel (both bagels with cream cheese) online. I went to pick up my order and they had bagged two Cinnamon Toast Crunch bagels with no cream cheese with my breakfast sandwiches. I proceeded to go back inside to get this fixed. An older gentleman came out from the kitchen in the middle of a wonderful man up front helping me, and started arguing with me that I was incorrect and that he bagged everything up. I tried to show him my receipt and the bag that did not match up and he proceeded to argue more. I do not appreciate this gentleman arguing that I, the customer who had proof it was not bagged correctly, was wrong for getting my order corrected. I will not be returning to this location. Photos show that my bagel bag and receipt did not match.
Como siempre todo rico

It was ok but there menu was confusing for me  and our cashier was having a bad day she didn't make it a very good day it was my 1st time and I ended up with extra  bread I didnt want  not a good experience
Apparently no one knows how to answer a phone here

Discovered a new dish! The chicken and wild rice soup is outstanding, I would definitely get it again. It also now has a choice of bread, fruit or a very yummy tomato and cucumber salad. I would definitely get that again. We sat outside on a nice evening.
I was there try to order something. They were saying closed. It was 8:30 pm. And they close 9:00pm.
I ordered kid's grilled cheese sandwich and kid's creamy tomato soup. Grilled cheese were not at all grilled and also there was no croutons for soup. It happened in the past too. Disappointed
It's good pricey.
Always tasty items always fresh wish they bring back the cherry cheese danish I'd probably visit there more often
The salad was good fresh i will return again
Food ok but so pricey.

I ordered a pick two with a Greek salad and added chicken and spinach but there was none on there. I also ordered a sandwich and added spinach and extra chipotle mayo and there was no spinach and no chipotle mayo even though I ordered extra. I don't know if the employees are illiterate or what but I actually used to work here 5 years ago and it was not that hard to read the screen and add what people wanted. This is the second time this has happened at Panera and it's just very frustrating. Like if I say add something add it, it's not hard. I also ordered extra tomato on my sandwich and I got one small slice....
Fresh food, quick service and friendly staff.  I will visit again, specially for breakfast.
Poorly run. Management here has no customer service experience, and the food is mediocre.
Tasty margherita flat bread.
CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

The morning crew moves slow! Especially the lady at the register in the morning! I get that your already at work but some of us are still on our way to work! It's literally ridiculous, she will turn around and start doing something else in the front while customers are in line waiting for their orders to be taken! Other Panera bread move faster and better in the mornings I'm disappointed in this Panera bread's morning customer service!

Worst Panera bread I've ever been to. This Panera bread is consistently inconsistent at best. I only eat breakfast here but between the rude heavy set girl that runs the register to the food never being as it should be it is depressing to say the least. Don't bother trying to call and complain because they refuse to answer the phone at this location..
Perfect place!  Friendly staff, well done!  Everything is delicious and fast!
Good place to get a quick meal.
Usually love this location. Today I ordered a Greek with chicken & only got crumbs of chicken. Very disappointed

It started out as a bad experience but the manager at this restaurant went way out & beyond to make it a very pleasant experience! It started out with me making an online delivery order for me & my kids because I just had surgery & was on bed rest. Well the wait was an hour & a 1/2 which we waited. I then received an email notification saying your food has been delivered. Checked my front door no food! I even had my daughter go check my neighbors front doors no food! So I called & got in touch with the manager this guy is the definition of what a manager should be! At first he had trouble finding my order that I placed which made me a little frustrated at first because the charge had already been debited from my card. So the manager says no worries I'll fix this, so he finds my order apologizes for the non delivery order & advises me that the next available time for delivery is another 2 hours away but to avoid me having to wait another 2 hours he will personally bring it out to me himself! Holy cow! I thought excellent customer service like this no longer exist! He brings it out knocks on the door & personally hands me our food! & The food was still smoking hot almost burned my tongue on the soup! & He wouldn't even except a tip! Only thing I regret is that I didn't get his name! Great deeds like this shouldn't go unnoticed!

They NEVER come out for curbside service. Order was supposed to be ready at  1051 and it's now 11:16 and no one will even answer the phone. I work with a sick little girl and can't risk getting sick so I avoid going into stores if possible. This is really sad service and I worked in the industry for a decade.
One of the best Panera Bread locations.  Opens at 7AM, walk in, everything is ready, it's clean and employees are happy.  Great start to the day.  Kudos to the location manager.

One of the best Panera locations in the Charlotte area. Everyone is professional and super friendly.  Yvonne and Tina give the cafe a very homey atmosphere. All go out of their way to make sure everything that you order is correct and that you are satisfied.  I appreciate that they follow strict CDC guidelines and are constantly cleaning the eating areas. My hats off to Kevin, who never stops. My only wish is that the patrons at least remove their trash and dishes from the tables when they are done eating. The only places that I know of where you just leave your dirty dishes on the table are places where you also leave a tip. Working together is the only way that we will all remain safe.
Felt liked I was being rushed eh didn't like the food personally
Buen servicio. Buena comida
Not bad,  has been pretty clean!  Customer service is nice!
Dwayne was so very understanding and helpful. He obviously was a well rounded professional who represented Panera well.
The food is ok
Buena comida y servicio rapido
Awesome chicken Cesar salad and mac n cheese
Excelente servicio y empleados agradables
Great food and service!
Good food for a reasonable price
overly friendly staff. Nice job!
I made an order for curbside and after 15 min I had to go in to get it and they had it ready.  Curbside has failed.
It was a good experience..Customer service on point will go BACK
Okay
It's easy to share Panera on Tuesday with the baker's dozen special.  Every at work enjoyed fresh bagels and cream cheese.  I really like the cinnamon sugar bagels with honey nut cream cheese.
Enjoyed a cup of tadty cream of tomato soup and a tuna sandwich.  The young woman that took our order was friendly and helpful.
Perfecta y buena atencion, rapidisima y puntual
Great Staff!

This is the most unprofessional environment I have seen in a very long time! For starters I was in line for 10 minutes waiting for someone to take my order just to find out that you only can pay with card. After I put my order in I asked for a side of butter only to get ignored three times. When they finally decided to hear me they gave me a lot of attitude. Then when I asked for a cup to get a fountain drink they gave me the wrong size lid and when I went back up to get a different lid they gave me it without gloves. They also forgot to give me my coffee I also ordered!!!!! After I left in a bad mood I realize that they didn't even give me butter and made my order wrong!!! I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone! very unprofessional and rude! do not go here!!!!!!!!!!!
Always good food. One of my favorite lunch spots. I enjoy the Turkey bravo sandwich, the teriyaki chicken sandwich and now the margherita flatbread pizza.
Me gusta mucho este lugar y exelente comida ,solo me gustaria que estuviera nas limpio.sino daria 5
Wonderful service,  Corey was a pleasure. Thanks guys

Quick service and maintenance . I went a couple of times during this pandemic and it's nothing less than expected. Teriyaki chicken sandwich was awesome. Definitely a good place for hygienic and tasty food.
It was very good

Very bad experience I ordered  my food via delivery.  When my food arrived the tamper  tape was not sealed and my bread was not wrapped just thrown in the bag. During  vivid I expected more it looked like someone  had been on my bag . I have been calling them all day  still no answer.
Never delivered my order after purchasing through the App

Sadly, we had a really bad experience at this Panera. It was pretty dirty. After waiting in line for about ten minutes we were informed they were all out of bread....at Panera. Completely out of bread The workers also seemed a bit uniformed of the menu, as my grandma was told the sandwich she ordered had no meat but indeed arrived with Chicken. I LOVE LOVE LOVE PANERA, but this location needs some help.
It's an amazing place.with great choices.

Counter person was great. People in the back were so slow and unorganized. Lady was waiting ten minutes before I got to the place for an order that was sitting in a bag in the front counter because the people in the back were to lazy to call out the names like we were told they would. Absolute lack of management.

This Panera is great! We go almost every other day to grab coffees with our coffee subscription. The employees are friendly and very willing to help. We had some issues with special instructions not being read when we first got our coffee subscription but they've gotten it right every time since. Would definitely recommend this location!!!
I forgot the lady's name that helped me but she was super nice!
Never work with table order and curbside pick up.

Enjoyed it. Great service. Very friendly atmosphere. The lemonades are everything there. This establishment was so culturally rich and inclusive. There was the most peaceful stench floating in the air of a perfect world.... It was a beautiful site.
Good food
Great!  Love Panera, especially this one!
ZERO gluten free options. Shocked and beyond disappointed. Will not be eating here.

CHECK YOUR ORDER AGAINST THE BAG THEY GIVE YOU, They don't.   -1 STAR missing food ordered.  -1 Rude employee when i called, and -1 difficult parking. +2 as the food we got was good. Check to see what you were supposed to get is in your bag.
Customer service was excellent Tina was my cashier she was very helpful and fast and did her job with a smile and a mask. Thank you for keeping us safe! Great job Panera

No show on delivery.. when they finally answered the phone.. they stated they were waiting on the driver to return.. said they had 5 orders they were delivering 30 minutes ago and I have been waiting over an hour lol... I suppose my food will not be luke warm at this point smh...
Love this establishment!!!!!! Awesome service!!!!!
Have had multiple occasions where I have ordered food and had to ask wth was going on since I had been waiting 20 mins. Have had much better service elsewhere.

Panera Bread is my favorite restaurant. I enjoy the happy service I receive when I go. However I was unhappy with the sanitation rating which was still an A but a lower A. My meal was great and filling (broccoli cheese soup and half sandwich) and the store was clean and neat. I will return when the rating goes up!

I waited over 10 minutes for a smoothie that was incorrect and presented poorly. The smoothie cup was filthy and was leaking everywhere and it was in a kids cup! I've never received such poor customer service and incorrect food in my life! The wait times were ridiculous and when I called to get the mistake corrected no one answered!! I still have yet to be contacted by management after receiving a kids size smoothie that was incorrect.

I eat here maybe 3 times a week. There are mixed thoughts. Really only one bad experience. I ordered my food through the app. When I got there my food wasnt in the box. 10 minutes later I asked and they handed me a bag that was sitting on the counter the whole time I was there. Not in the box to pick up. Just on the counter waiting for an employee to put it where it belonged. Other than this one instance I love this place. The food is great and there are plenty of healthy and not so healthy options!
Good clean food
Love this place!!

I placed an order online for pick up and when I got home part of my order was not in the bag. Being pregnant and frustrated that I had to turn around and drive back, I called the manager and spoke to him and explained to him what happened as well as why I was so upset. He went above and beyond to correct the order - turning a negative situation into a positive one. I also felt like he cared about what I was telling him and didn't brush me off. 5 stars not necessarily for the food but because of the customer service I received.
The service was great! But the cookies were really dry.

Terrible service tonight. Went in around 7pm and they claimed to be out of all of their soups and the sandwiches I got were all messed up, see photo. I don't typically make negative reviews but this was pretty disappointing. I'd understand if they were out of items near closing. But this was early in the night. I will not be going back to this location.
Just went there me and my friend he got home and his sandwich was messed up he had to drive 10 mile to go back.
Typical Panera. Nice salads, soups and sandwiches. Well kept. Quick service.

Great breakfast sandwiches and surprisingly good coffee. I always try their dark roast coffee and l'm pleasantly surprised how consistently good it is.
My recommendation for breakfast sandwich to try will be their ham and egg over easy on brioche and add avocado.
Good service and good selection of food and cakes

Food was great, people were very friendly and attentive.  My only complaint is the 2 lemonade drinks I choose from were empty, and then I went for simple fountain root beer.  It was also clear and out of syrup.

Food is ok, but have been here twice when they seemed out of quite a number of items. ALWAYS looks like the place needs cleaning. I never see more than about three employees. Sometimes long lines at register with NO One using the kiosks. HIRE SOME PEOPLE! Hard to have good customer service when there is no one there to give it.
Always short lines and great cashiers. I go after work and get my to go order within a few minutes.
The Turkey Chili and sandwich was very good.
Food is always good, but I dislike when they are cleaning like it's closing and it's 7 pm.
This will always be my forever go to place for comfort foods. My only concern is the brownie I love is no longer part of the selections.
Great bowls added to their menu .. you must try
No line and really good chili.
Best location,  friendly staff.
Foods wasn't that great
Great tomatoe soup, and good baked goods, prices are reasonable.
Amazing
Friendly staff

We showed up at 9:29 midweek after a soccer game thinking that this Panera was open until 10, but they close at 9:30 on week-nights.  I know they hated seeing us walk in after they had already mostly cleaned for the night, but they stopped cleaning, treated us like royalty, and never showed any frustration as they fired the oven back up.  My daughter was thankful for a warm meal after a late game - and that's why we go there when we're on the run.  Thanks Whitehall Panera!
Food is consistently good. Ordering was somewhat hectic today. The rapid pickup window expeditor and 2 male managers were very helpful though.
No kiosk, they don't take your food to your table

I've had some pretty bad experiences at other Panera locations closer to the city. Wasn't sure what to expect with it being my first time at this one, but I was delightfully pleased. The food came out fast. We usually have a semi complicated order with our sandwiches but the kitchen executed it perfectly. I could hear the food runner and the kitchen communicating effectively and that's what makes a smooth running machine out of a business. Thanks for having us and thanks for the delicious lunch. Kudos!
Amazing food and super fast delivery, highly recommended to all
Love Panera
Food prep is extraordinarily slow. Throw the bagel and a cream cheese in the bag and just hand it to me.
Good food

I placed an online order, which luckily I checked before leaving with it because it was incorrect. The employee was quick to make it right (reason for 3 starts). Once getting back to my hotel with my food I realized my panini was not toasted and the bread was so soggy. The inside itself smells very bad. Musky, restroom-like smell odor throughout the entire dining area. Needs a carpet clean?
The best
horrible service, food was cold, boys in the line beside me had to go into to kitchen to get someone to help them because no one was at the registers for 10 minutes
Staff was great and food was fresh.  Personally I just think Panera has gotten wickedly overpriced for what you get.
Great food!!!
The slowest Panera in Charlotte
Mmm I had the half steak and white cheese sandwich and a Caesar salad. The sandwich has a bit of horseradish sauce on it which made it even better
Definitely panera bread. You guys should definitely open in Chile. Panera will just crush it in there!
Love the food great place to eat

ALWAYS OUT OF BAGELS. I've been going to this location for the last year and they are consistently out of bagels. Call customer service to find out why and they apologize, but same thing during following visit.
I went in at 10AM and they were completely out of bagels. This is a weekly occurrence and panera bread seems to not care they dont have bread in panera BREAD.

Very disappointed in this location. Consistently out of product.
Healthy Food,nice ,clean place to grab a,quick bite
I love the ham and swiss souffle
Great food!
Food is a hit or miss at this location. Service is good.
It was ok not great astomphere
Awesome as usual, regardless of where I go in the US. Same quality all over US.
Good but small portions.
Great atmosphere, great coffe
Terrible customer service and they need more training on making drinks would never come back
Staff need more training
The food is ok and the prices are just too much. I very seldom find it clean but it is a good place to have meetings or sit peacefully with your work or computer.

As a full time nursing student I have little time to cook, I can always depend panera to get healthy options to eat. I love this location and mananger Travis went above and beyond to assist me today! I appreciate the service and will continue to visit

Received old bad brown apples when I ordered apple slices and the spoon they gave me for my soup was dirty and looked used! The apples for sure are in the trash and I'm not sure if i even want to eat the soup......

Really good service with alright food. I got a salad and the avocado in it was not ripe at all. I had to cute it with a knife just to do enjoy it because it was so hard. Other than that, it was a great experience and we got cookies at the end. Next time I will not be eating the avocados.
Love the pick two. Good service, just a bit of a wait.
Their salad is great!
